title: Video: Spring Offensive – Carrier
body:
Because I just haven’t quite done enough posts about Oxford downbeatsmiths **Spring Offensive**, here’s their latest video, for the song _Carrier_.

In the wake of the song, any sort of _précis_ or admission of admiration and belief seems to come across as reductive or mawkish respectively, and besides, fellow Oxford act [Aethara](https://www.facebook.com/aethara#!/aethara?sk=info "Because who doesn't love a bit of metal on a Wednesday?") seem to have summed it up pretty well already. As they’ve noted, ‘_Ok, so this isn’t metal! BUT… these guys are AWESOME!_‘

_Carrier_ is the b-side to forthcoming single _Worry, Fill My Heart._ Spring Offensive are dab hands at [social networking](https://www.facebook.com/?ref=tn_tnmn#!/springoffensive "I"), [blogging](http://springoffensive.tumblr.com/ "believe"), and indeed [the lost art of actually having a real website](http://springoffensive.co.uk/ "in this goddamn band.").

_Update: We’ve just been sent the dates for their forthcoming UK tour-_

MARCH  
16 The End, Birmingham  
29 Electricity Showrooms, London  
30 The Green Door Store, Brighton  
31 Secret Location, Oxford

APRIL  
01 The Castle Hotel, Manchester  
02 SOYO, Sheffield  
03 The Head of Steam, Newcastle  
04 The Shipping Forecast, Liverpool  
05 Gwdihw, Cardiff  
10 Schon Schön, Mainz  
11 MUZ, Nurnberg  
12 Häll, Heidelberg  
13 Parterre, Basel
